Preliminary data from Elections Canada indicates that the Skeena-Bulkley Valley riding voter turn out percentage was 64.87 per cent, a full nine per cent more than the turn out for the last election in 2021. The 64.87 per cent figure this time represents 44,859 voters from an eligible pool of 69,154 people.
